module.name: Asterisk REST Interface Users
module.changelog: *15.0.3.8* FREEPBX-20951 Restoring backup in FreePBX 15 system is not restoring "password_format" field of the ari manager module. *15.0.3.7* FREEI-890 Fix XSS Bootstrap Datatable Issues *15.0.3.6* FREEPBX-20568 Restoring FreePBX 15 Backup is not restoring Asterisk Rest Interface Users entries. *15.0.3.5* Related to FREEPBX-20414: removed $jobid from runRestore() *15.0.3.4* FREEPBX-18676 Configuration File Link removed(http://freepbx.org/configuration_files) *15.0.3.3* FREEPBX-19574 frix system standard user *15.0.3.2* fixing legacy restore *15.0.3* Fix visuals *15.0.2.1* Remove duplicated code *15.0.2* Packaging of ver 15.0.2 *15.0.1* Forked from 13.0.4,enable by default
module.description: Asterisk 12 introduces the Asterisk REST Interface (ARI), a set of RESTful API's for building Asterisk based applications. This module provides the ability to add and remove ARI users.
